text: I’m clear about my political influence and talent and I know I will have direct involvement in the 2020 cycle. And unless this shit gets burned down (likely) there will be another presidential cycle I can work beginning to end

text: Now that I’m public about it I’m thinking about all the folks who now know and may make decisions not to engage or hire me because “she trying to get pregnant, not win an election” #BlackAndIVF
author: ljoywilliams

text: Late last year I began talking to some of the announced and unannounced candidates about their campaigns but thought how can I crisscross the country and do IVF? #BlackAndIVF
author: ljoywilliams

text: I’ve wanted to work on a presidential campaign from beginning (early primaries) to end (November general) for over a decade. This cycle I was excited to have the opportunity but now... #BlackAndIVF

text: Thanks. We would love to hear how you are changing and whatnoutlets you read?
author: ljoywilliams

text: We are super optimistic but also pragmatic. If you are a praying person, keep us uplifted. Feel free to share resources, things to read and questions we should ask doctors. #BlackAndIVF
author: ljoywilliams

text: All of my current doctors are hoping the pills, along with hormone shots and such won’t make me miserable. Lord I pray not because migraines are of the devil #BlackAndIVF
author: ljoywilliams

text: The slightest change in my hormones produce serious migraines so when I was a pre-teen doctors told me I couldn’t take birth control. #BlackAndIVF
author: ljoywilliams

text: Last week I started birth control pills (weird that is part of the process) and I’ve never taken birth control pills in my entire life. #BlackAndIVF
author: ljoywilliams

text: I’ve had multiple miscarriages and now that I’m 40 I have declining ovarian reserve so we are choosing to try this method #BlackAndIVF
author: ljoywilliams

text: So friends, this week my husband and I begin #IVF. I plan to share along the way because there are too many women who suffer in silence regarding fertility, particularly Black women. #BlackAndIVF
author: ljoywilliams
